New Records: Rilee Rossouw struck the first century of this T20 World Cup
South Africa set the 2022 edition's highest total
Key Match Events: Rilee Rossouw and Quinton de Kock added 163 for the second wicket, the second-highest partnership in the tournament's history
Anrich Nortje ran through the Bangladesh top order
South Africa's spinners, including Tabraiz Shamsi, took over and bowled out Bangladesh for 101
Pre-Game Insights: There were no pre-game insights mentioned in the article
Post-Match Reflections: Rilee Rossouw struck his second successive T20I century
South Africa won by 104 runs, their biggest victory in this format
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in Sydney, and there was a 22-minute rain-break during the Powerplay
Rossouw struck six of his eight sixes between long-on and wide long-on
de Kock struck most of his fours through point and third-man
